title: Analysis of the Relationship Between Design Decisions and Performance: Structured Performance Space Mapping

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematics and design principles, awareness of optimization concepts
context.additional_context: Students perform projects visualizing/analyzing relationships between design variables and performance metrics through real-world cases

learning_goals: Learners can describe methods for mapping design decision spaces to performance spaces.
Learners can analyze multiple performance metrics using Pareto optimization techniques.
Learners can produce reports quantifying the impact of design variables within a structured performance space.

resources: Performance data visualization software (Tableau, Python Plotly)
Architectural design dataset for case studies

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
